name: Reality Show Custom Simulators
description:
A Survivor simulator made in Unity that is heavily inspired by Brantsteele's simulators. Contains simulators with twists like double tribal councils, swaps, EOE, Redemption Island, and Outcasts. There's even a simulator with a swap every episode! You can use a version with either regular or cinematic tribal councils. There's no in-depth logic or advantages yet but those features will be added later on

Disclaimer:

-Not for mobile

Github link:https://github.com/nickyDaggs/ndaggs-RealityShowCustomSimulators

Check out the Brantsteele sims too:https://brantsteele.com/index.php
